It is easily synchronized with corporate Exchange server when the user connected to corporate network. Usually, the account auto-configures itself during the first launch of Outlook application.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to configure the new / additional account in Outlook that is hosted by an external service provider, it is also necessary to know the names and authentication requirements of the incoming and outgoing servers. These will be available from the e-mail service provider. attempts to log on by using the password you entered. If the connection is successful, a confirmation appears, along with additional account configuration options. You can click Finish on the wizard's final page to begin using your account, or you can configure additional settings.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After successfully configuring a connection to an e-mail account, you can modify the account's server settings, add another account, or click Finish to begin using the account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All other possible cases of connecting to the corporate email account, including those when the connection is performed over the Internet (not from the corporate Network) are described in the “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/pal_method_plugin/guidances/whitepapers/resources/EPM-SPI_AccesstoE-mailServicesWIGLO.doc\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access to E-mail Services\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"” document stored on PAL.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
